name: man-search-provider
description: Search man pages from GNOME Shell

scripts.clear: npm run project:clear-dist; npm run project:clear-extension
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run setup && npm run debug
scripts.project:install-extension: [ -e $npm_package_config_DIST_DIR ] && { npm run project:clear-extension; npm run project:mkdir-extension && echo 'Install...'; cp -r ./dist/* metadata.json `eval echo "$npm_package_config_EXTENSION_DIR/$npm_package_config_ID/"` && echo 'ok'; } || echo 'ERROR: Nothing to install. Run "npm run build" first'
scripts.nested-shell:start: $npm_package_config_TERMINAL --title='gnome-shell debug output' $npm_package_config_TERMINAL_PARAM bash -c 'env GNOME_SHELL_SLOWDOWN_FACTOR=2 MUTTER_DEBUG_DUMMY_MODE_SPECS=$npm_package_config_WIN_SIZE LC_ALL=$npm_package_config_LANG G_MESSAGES_DEBUG=GNOME\ Shell dbus-run-session -- gnome-shell --nested --wayland' &>/dev/null; echo '...Nested Shell started'
scripts.nested-shell:restart: npm run nested-shell:stop; sleep 1; npm run nested-shell:start
